title: Pain au chocolat blanc with raspberries and cream cheese
description: Pull out all the stops with homemade pastries full of  white chocolate, fresh raspberries and cream cheese.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a piping bag fitted with 7mm plain nozzle and a freestanding mixer with a dough hook attachment.
ingredients: 250g unsalted butter, chilled, in a block
1 large free-range eggs, beaten, for glazing
